Key Match Events: Argentina scored the first goal in the 49th minute by Julián Álvarez
Lautaro Martínez scored the second goal for Argentina in the 88th minute
Post-Match Reflections: Canada's players expressed disappointment with the result but took confidence from their performance
Canada needs at least a point against Peru next week to stand a chance of advancing from Group A
Miscellaneous Highlights: Maxime Crépeau delivered an immense performance as Canada's goalkeeper
Canada's press got increasingly aggressive after the hour mark as they put more pressure on the Argentine keeper
Others: The match took place in Copa América, Group A
Canada played the same side that drew 0-0 with France in a friendly, while Argentina played their strongest possible side
